channel.title: Posts on Nathan's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nathan's Site

item.title: Stealth Flipper
item.description: Being More Stealthy With A Flipper Let’s be honest, most flipper users use the flipper to dick around. You know, pop Tesla charge covers, set off CVS alcohol announcements (Bonus points if you do it in a state CVS can’t sell alcohol in (Like Maryland)). You know, fun stuff. The Flipper is unfortunately recognizable (Thanks to dumpsters like TikTok). So, if we’re going to have some fun in a CVS, or a Tesla store, we need to be a bit sneaky.

item.title: PaintBoy Advance
item.description: PaintBoy advance I’m not new to modded gameboys. I’ve put IPS screens in a DMG and an SP, and I built an all metal gameboy advance. Ive gotten the itch to build a custom GBA again after working on my girlfriend’s GBA, I just need an ideaâ€¦ This is what I’m thinking. This is made from painting the inside of a clear shell, allowing the supports to still be seen. This isn’t mine it’s a screenshot from this YouTube vid.
